plays.text: Goal scored by Ryan VandenBussche assisted by Bob Probert and Steve Poapst
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jukka Hentunen

Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for Interference Jukka Hentunen
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 2 minutes for Charging Steve Poapst
Penalty to Derek Morris 5 minutes for Fighting Mark Bell
Penalty to Mark Bell 5 minutes for Fighting Derek Morris
Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Nichol
Goal scored by JAMIE WRIGHT assisted by Denis Gauthier
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Crosschecking Kyle Calder
Penalty to Tony Amonte 2 minutes for Tripping Derek Morris
Goal scored by Dean McAmmond assisted by Derek Morris and Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Michael Nylander 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Nichol
